broker.bankIdDesc: All broker licenses are personal and require BankID verification to ensure legitimacy. This gives you a "Verified broker" badge that increases trust with users.
broker.faqShare: Can multiple brokers share a license?
broker.faqShareAnswer: No, licenses are personal and require BankID verification. Each broker needs their own license.
broker.faqAds: How many ads can I have active?
broker.faqAdsAnswer: Pro: 10 simultaneously. Premium: unlimited. You can upgrade anytime.
broker.faqInvoice: Can I invoice my customers through the platform?
broker.faqInvoiceAnswer: Yes, in the Premium license you can add your margin and invoice customers directly through the system.
broker.faqApiAnswer: The Premium license includes REST API to integrate BOLAXO with your CRM or website.
